name: North Staffordshire School Direct
trainWithUs: St Anne's Primary School is a "good" school in the Staffordshire Moorlands located on the edge of the Moorlands and Stoke. We have a range of schools in our consortium based in our own area and into Stoke and a couple towards Newcastle Under Lyme. We are a single form entry school with a friendly, consistent staff who have a long history of successful mentoring. There are around 210 children in our school which is from age 4-11 and our children are always complimented on their welcoming attitudes. As a School Direct consortium we strive to offer diversity across our partnership through the schools that we use. Schools and mentors are placed together with a "best fit" in mind for everyone involved: the associate teacher, the mentor and the school itself. We pride ourselves on our strong relationship with the university and we work closely together to make your experience as thorough and fluid as possible.
trainWithDisability: We are more than happy to do what is needed to support any specific needs that you may have in order to make the most of your training.
